name: latitudinal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the position north or south of the equator measured from 0° to 90°: Only in a very few latitudinal bands is there more land than sea. Russia has a high latitudinal position. See
latitude
More examplesFewer examplesThe Earth can be sub-divided into latitudinal belts of similar climate.This latitudinal band of reduced precipitation will widen as the Earth continues to warm.Many recent studies have examined latitudinal variation in animal species richness.
